objectives.title: Complete Network Infrastructure Setup
objectives.description: Install and configure network switches, PoE injectors, and cabling for all camera locations

successCriteria.description: Network uptime and connectivity across all camera endpoints

objectives.title: Install All Camera Hardware
objectives.description: Mount and connect all 15 cameras across both locations

successCriteria.description: Camera operational status with clear video feed quality

objectives.title: Configure Video Management System
objectives.description: Set up VMS server, add all cameras, configure recording schedules and retention policies

objectives.title: User Training and Documentation
objectives.description: Conduct training sessions for staff and provide comprehensive documentation

successCriteria.description: Staff competency in system operation and troubleshooting

objectives.title: Site Survey and Planning
objectives.description: Complete detailed site surveys for all three retail locations

successCriteria.description: Coverage of all critical retail areas with no blind spots

objectives.title: Deploy Retail Analytics
objectives.description: Configure people counting, heat mapping, and dwell time analytics

successCriteria.description: Accuracy in customer counting and behavior tracking

objectives.title: POS Integration
objectives.description: Integrate video system with point-of-sale systems for transaction verification

successCriteria.description: Transaction-to-video correlation accuracy for fraud detection

objectives.title: Obtain Building Permits
objectives.description: Submit and obtain necessary permits for camera installation in commercial building

successCriteria.description: Compliance with all local and federal regulations

objectives.title: Network Security Configuration
objectives.description: Configure VLANs, firewall rules, and secure remote access for camera network

successCriteria.description: Security audit score for network infrastructure protection

objectives.title: Safety Zone Monitoring Setup
objectives.description: Configure AI-based safety monitoring for all trampoline zones

successCriteria.description: Accuracy in detecting unsafe behavior and zone violations

objectives.title: Customer Analytics Dashboard
objectives.description: Set up dashboard for visitor counting, peak hours analysis, and capacity management

successCriteria.description: Accuracy on customer wait time at checkout with full journey time

objectives.title: Mobile App Integration
objectives.description: Enable mobile viewing and alerts for facility managers

successCriteria.description: App responsiveness and notification delivery speed

objectives.title: Footfall Counting
objectives.description: Implement AI-powered footfall counting at entrance to track visitor numbers and peak hours

successCriteria.description: Visitor counting accuracy during peak and off-peak hours
